snippet: More employers are offering financial incentives to encourage healthier behavior by their workers and help lower health care costs.
abstract: More employers are offering financial incentives to encourage healthier behavior by their workers and help lower health care costs.
lead_paragraph: More big employers are dangling financial incentives to persuade workers and their families to adopt healthier behaviors and help control health care costs, a new survey reports.

headline.main: Employers Dangle Carrots for Behaviors That Help Lower Costs
